name: Illumise

passive.name: Encouraging Gleam
passive.effect: If there is a Volbeat in play, Light Screen generates 4 tokens, and Illumise has 70 HP.

attacks.name: Light Screen
attacks.effect: Create 2 Light Screen tokens. Reduce damage to your Active Pokemon by 10 if there are any Light Screen tokens. At the end of your turn, get rid of a Light Screen Token.

attacks.name: Moonlight Dance
attacks.effect: You may search your Discard Pile for an Energy card, reveal it, and put it into your hand.

flavor: These bugs are beautiful in the night sky. They dance with Volbeat to make even midnight bright.
